task.title: Assemble the Typewriter
task.shortdesc: It is important to carefully reassemble the typewriter after cleaning to ensure all components are securely in place and functioning properly.

step.cmd: Line up the metal segment plate with the typewriter feet.
step.stepresult: The segment plate must be placed evenly on both feet.

step.note: The prongs need not be forced. If aligned properly, they should slide in effortlessly
step.cmd: Slide the two prongs on one side of the plate into the two slots on their respective typewriter foot.
Firmly push down until the prongs on the other side of the plate line up with the slots in the remaining foot.

substep.cmd: Apply gentle pressure in the direction of the inserted prong-slot while pushing down
Remove pressure from the other side once the prongs are fully inserted into the foot slots.

step.note: Small misalignment can cause screws to cross-thread, adjust the panel gently
step.cmd: Line up the panel component screw slots with their corresponding slots on the typewriter frame.
Insert and tighten the panel screws until all panel components are reattached.
If any key caps or knobs were removed in the cleaning process, reattach them now.

taskbody.result: Your typewriter should now be fully assembled, with all panels secured and components functioning smoothly.
